item.title: Summer Goals, starting a blog in an hour a day, and Iris
item.description: Being in school is great—at the end of each semester, I feel like I can restart my life and make New Year’s Resolutions. My big goal now that the last semester is over is to develop a data science portfolio in the form of a blog. Link to image Why isn’t my link working??? I should be
